Name: The Little War
About the game: 'The Little War' is a fast paced PvP shooter. The game has a variety of weapons and MOBA, Capture The Flag, DeathMatch and other game modes, more unique lift platform system. Easy pick up and play, no complicated setups or rules: itâ€™s kill or be killed! Maps and Modes Hexagons covers a wide variety of locations in its many maps. Some are large and some are small, but all of them have personality and something that makes it unique and different Gameplay: MOBA Mode (Unskilled pure shooting MOBA mode) DeathMatch Capture The Flag Game Features Unique lift platform system that allows you to have more time to kill at altitude. A variety of weapons in the game, there are left and right two shooting modes. There are always new ways to kill enemies in Hexagons. The game has multiple game characters. More features are under development.
